00045 static const TraceClass TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES("CLI_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES", Help()
00046     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "IO device instance management")
00047     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Gestion des intances de périphériques d'entrée/sortie"));
00048 static const TraceClass TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING("CLI_IO_DEVICE_OPENING", Help()
00049     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "IO device opening management")
00050     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Gestion de l'ouverture des périphériques d'entrée/sortie"));

00053 OutputDevice::OutputDevice(
00054         const char* const STR_DbgName,
00055         const char* const STR_Endl,
00056         const bool B_AutoDelete)
00057   : m_strDbgName(MAX_DEVICE_NAME_LENGTH, STR_DbgName),
00058     m_strEndl(MAX_WORD_LENGTH, STR_Endl),
00059     m_iInstanceLock(B_AutoDelete ? 0 : 1), m_iOpenLock(0)
00060 {
00061     // Please, no traces in constructor for consistency reasons.
00062 }
00063 
00064 OutputDevice::~OutputDevice(void)
00065 {
00066 }
00067 
00068 const int OutputDevice::UseInstance(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00069 {
00070     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES)
00071         << "One more user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00072         << "user count: " << m_iInstanceLock << " -> " << m_iInstanceLock + 1 << ", "
00073         << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00074         << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00075     m_iInstanceLock ++;
00076     return m_iInstanceLock;
00077 }
00078 
00079 const int OutputDevice::FreeInstance(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00080 {
00081     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES)
00082         << "One less user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00083         << "user count: " << m_iInstanceLock << " -> " << m_iInstanceLock - 1 << ", "
00084         << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00085         << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00086     if (m_iInstanceLock == 1)
00087     {
00088         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES)
00089             << "Deleting the device " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << endl;
00090         delete this;
00091         return 0;
00092     }
00093     else
00094     {
00095         m_iInstanceLock --;
00096         CLI_ASSERT(m_iInstanceLock > 0);
00097         return m_iInstanceLock;
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 const int OutputDevice::GetInstanceUsers(void) const
00102 {
00103     return m_iInstanceLock;
00104 }
00105 
00106 const bool OutputDevice::OpenUp(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00107 {
00108     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00109         << "One more user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00110         << "user count: " << m_iOpenLock << " -> " << m_iOpenLock + 1 << ", "
00111         << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00112         << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00113 
00114     m_iOpenLock ++;
00115 
00116     if (m_iOpenLock == 1)
00117     {
00118         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00119             << "Opening the device " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << endl;
00120         if (! OpenDevice())
00121         {
00122             return false;
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     return true;
00127 }
00128 
00129 const bool OutputDevice::CloseDown(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00130 {
00131     bool b_Res = true;
00132 
00133     if (m_iOpenLock > 0)
00134     {
00135         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00136             << "One less user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00137             << "user count: " << m_iOpenLock << " -> " << m_iOpenLock - 1 << ", "
00138             << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00139             << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00140 
00141         if (m_iOpenLock == 1)
00142         {
00143             GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00144                 << "Closing the device " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << endl;
00145             b_Res = CloseDevice();
00146         }
00147 
00148         m_iOpenLock --;
00149     }
00150     else
00151     {
00152         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00153             << "No more closing down for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00154             << "user count = " << m_iOpenLock << ", "
00155             << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00156             << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00157     }
00158 
00159     return b_Res;
00160 }
00161 
00162 const int OutputDevice::GetOpenUsers(void) const
00163 {
00164     return m_iOpenLock;
00165 }

00173 const OutputDevice& OutputDevice::operator <<(const char* const STR_Out) const
00174 {
00175     if (STR_Out != NULL)
00176     {
00177         PutString(STR_Out);
00178     }
00179     return *this;
00180 }

00214 const OutputDevice& OutputDevice::operator <<(const int I_Out) const
00215 {
00216     char str_Out[128];
00217     snprintf(str_Out, sizeof(str_Out), "%d", I_Out);
00218     PutString(str_Out);
00219     return *this;

00257 OutputDevice& OutputDevice::GetNullDevice(void)
00258 {
00259     class NullDevice : public OutputDevice
00260     {
00261     public:
00262         NullDevice(void) : OutputDevice("null", "", false) {}
00263         virtual ~NullDevice(void) {}
00264 
00265     protected:
00266         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00267         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00268     public:
00269         virtual void PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const {}
00270         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00271     };
00272 
00273     static NullDevice cli_Null;
00274     return cli_Null;
00275 }

00277 OutputDevice& OutputDevice::GetStdOut(void)
00278 {
00279     class StdOutDevice : public OutputDevice
00280     {
00281     public:
00282         StdOutDevice(void) : OutputDevice("stdout", "\n", false) {}
00283         virtual ~StdOutDevice(void) {}
00284 
00285     protected:
00286         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00287         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00288     public:
00289         virtual void PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const { fprintf(stdout, "%s", STR_Out); }
00290         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00291     };
00292 
00293     static StdOutDevice cli_StdOut;
00294     return cli_StdOut;
00295 }

00297 OutputDevice& OutputDevice::GetStdErr(void)
00298 {
00299     class StdErrDevice : public OutputDevice
00300     {
00301     public:
00302         StdErrDevice(void) : OutputDevice("stderr", "\n", false) {}
00303         virtual ~StdErrDevice(void) {}
00304 
00305     protected:
00306         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00307         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00308     public:
00309         virtual void PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const { fprintf(stderr, "%s", STR_Out); }
00310         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00311     };
00312 
00313     static StdErrDevice cli_StdErr;
00314     return cli_StdErr;
00315 }

00330 IODevice& IODevice::GetNullDevice(void)
00331 {
00332     class NullDevice : public IODevice
00333     {
00334     public:
00335         NullDevice(void) : IODevice("null", "", false) {}
00336         virtual ~NullDevice(void) {}
00337 
00338     protected:
00339         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00340         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00341     public:
00342         virtual void PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const {}
00343         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00344         virtual const KEY GetKey(void) const { return NULL_KEY; }
00345     };
00346 
00347     static NullDevice cli_Null;
00348     return cli_Null;
00349 }

00351 IODevice& IODevice::GetStdIn(void)
00352 {
00353     class StdInDevice : public IODevice
00354     {
00355     public:
00356         StdInDevice(void) : IODevice("stdin", "", false) {
00357         }
00358         virtual ~StdInDevice(void) {
00359         }
00360 
00361     protected:
00362         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) {
00363             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00364             return OutputDevice::GetStdOut().OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__);
00365         }
00366         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) {
00367             bool b_Res = OutputDevice::GetStdOut().CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__);
00368             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00369             return b_Res;
00370         }
00371     public:
00372         virtual void PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const {
00373             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().PutString(STR_Out);
00374         }
00375         virtual void Beep(void) const {
00376             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().Beep();
00377         }
00378         virtual const KEY GetKey(void) const {
00379             const char c_Char = (char) getchar();
00380                 return IODevice::GetKey(c_Char);
00381             }
00382     };
00383 
00384     static StdInDevice cli_StdIn;
00385     return cli_StdIn;
00386 }
00387 
00388 const KEY IODevice::GetKey(const int I_Char) const
00389 {
00390     switch (I_Char)
00391     {
00392     case 3:             return BREAK;
00393     case 4:             return LOGOUT;
00394     case 10: case 13:   return ENTER;
00395     case 27:            return ESCAPE;
00396     case 127:           return BACKSPACE;
00397     case 1001:          return KEY_UP;
00398     case 1002:          return KEY_DOWN;
00399     case 1005:          return PAGE_UP;
00400     case 1006:          return PAGE_DOWN;
00401 
00402     case ' ':           return SPACE;
00403     case '\t':          return TAB;
00404 
00405     case '0':   return KEY_0;
00406     case '1':   return KEY_1;
00407     case '2':   return KEY_2;
00408     case '3':   return KEY_3;
00409     case '4':   return KEY_4;
00410     case '5':   return KEY_5;
00411     case '6':   return KEY_6;
00412     case '7':   return KEY_7;
00413     case '8':   return KEY_8;
00414     case '9':   return KEY_9;
00415 
00416     case 'a':   return KEY_a;
00417     case 'b':   return KEY_b;
00418     case 'c':   return KEY_c;
00419     case 'd':   return KEY_d;
00420     case 'e':   return KEY_e;
00421     case 'f':   return KEY_f;
00422     case 'g':   return KEY_g;
00423     case 'h':   return KEY_h;
00424     case 'i':   return KEY_i;
00425     case 'j':   return KEY_j;
00426     case 'k':   return KEY_k;
00427     case 'l':   return KEY_l;
00428     case 'm':   return KEY_m;
00429     case 'n':   return KEY_n;
00430     case 'o':   return KEY_o;
00431     case 'p':   return KEY_p;
00432     case 'q':   return KEY_q;
00433     case 'r':   return KEY_r;
00434     case 's':   return KEY_s;
00435     case 't':   return KEY_t;
00436     case 'u':   return KEY_u;
00437     case 'v':   return KEY_v;
00438     case 'w':   return KEY_w;
00439     case 'x':   return KEY_x;
00440     case 'y':   return KEY_y;
00441     case 'z':   return KEY_z;
00442 
00443     case 'A':   return KEY_A;
00444     case 'B':   return KEY_B;
00445     case 'C':   return KEY_C;
00446     case 'D':   return KEY_D;
00447     case 'E':   return KEY_E;
00448     case 'F':   return KEY_F;
00449     case 'G':   return KEY_G;
00450     case 'H':   return KEY_H;
00451     case 'I':   return KEY_I;
00452     case 'J':   return KEY_J;
00453     case 'K':   return KEY_K;
00454     case 'L':   return KEY_L;
00455     case 'M':   return KEY_M;
00456     case 'N':   return KEY_N;
00457     case 'O':   return KEY_O;
00458     case 'P':   return KEY_P;
00459     case 'Q':   return KEY_Q;
00460     case 'R':   return KEY_R;
00461     case 'S':   return KEY_S;
00462     case 'T':   return KEY_T;
00463     case 'U':   return KEY_U;
00464     case 'V':   return KEY_V;
00465     case 'W':   return KEY_W;
00466     case 'X':   return KEY_X;
00467     case 'Y':   return KEY_Y;
00468     case 'Z':   return KEY_Z;
00469 
00470     case '+':   return PLUS;
00471     case '-':   return MINUS;
00472     case '*':   return STAR;
00473     case '/':   return SLASH;
00474     case '<':   return LOWER_THAN;
00475     case '>':   return GREATER_THAN;
00476     case '=':   return EQUAL;
00477     case '%':   return PERCENT;
00478 
00479     case '_':   return UNDERSCORE;
00480     case '@':   return AROBASE;
00481     case '#':   return SHARP;
00482     case '&':   return AMPERCENT;
00483     case '$':   return DOLLAR;
00484     case '\\':  return BACKSLASH;
00485     case '|':   return PIPE;
00486 
00487     case '?':   return QUESTION;
00488     case '!':   return EXCLAMATION;
00489     case ':':   return COLUMN;
00490     case '.':   return DOT;
00491     case ',':   return COMA;
00492     case ';':   return SEMI_COLUMN;
00493     case '\'':  return QUOTE;
00494     case '"':   return DOUBLE_QUOTE;
00495 
00496     case '(':   return OPENING_BRACE;
00497     case ')':   return CLOSING_BRACE;
00498     case '{':   return OPENING_CURLY_BRACE;
00499     case '}':   return CLOSING_CURLY_BRACE;
00500     case '[':   return OPENING_BRACKET;
00501     case ']':   return CLOSING_BRACKET;
00502 
00503     default:
00504         // Unrecognized character.
00505         return NULL_KEY;
00506     }
